attributes.action: Make the sex offenders register publicly accessible
attributes.additional_details: Because people deserve to know if there is a threat to their kids in the area and what type of people are living in their area. Sarah's law is a thing but that takes a while to get the results and its just better if you're planning to move and you see someone with a record of that nature you'll be aware of what type of person they are.
attributes.background: Make the sex offenders register publicly accessible for people to check. You should make a website with the name of the sex offender and crime they committed accessible.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Create a public register of domestic abuse offenders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713569
